column5: I plan on fishing lake St.Clair this week.. any hot spots for jumbos yet??

caught several jumbos about 7 miles east of channel. from marker#28 go 130degrees til you see a large group of boats. I try to stay on the outside of the group.Get there very early 7am -8:30am monitor channel 9
Where do you put in???? AND Do you ever fish Canadian waters ,,(ST.Lukes)(lake Erie)??
